scripts.dev:rate-limiter: sst shell -- bun src/wrangler.ts dev --config src/wrangler/rate-limiter/wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:rate-limiter: sst shell -- bun src/wrangler.ts deploy --config src/wrangler/rate-limiter/wrangler.toml
scripts.dev:workflow: sst shell -- bun src/wrangler.ts dev --config src/wrangler/workflow/wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:workflow: sst shell -- bun src/wrangler.ts deploy --config src/wrangler/workflow/wrangler.toml
scripts.deploy:all: bun run deploy:rate-limiter && bun run deploy:workflow
